title: Use Sepsis Screening Tool
description: Based on a patient's vital signs and lab results, a CDS alert fires, recommending a sepsis screening. A nurse needs to complete the screening tool.

tasks.expected_outcome: Nurse sees and acknowledges the recommendation from the CDS system.
Nurse opens the specific documentation tool for sepsis screening.

tasks.description: Complete the screening questions. The tool calculates a score indicating high risk for sepsis and advises notifying the provider.
tasks.expected_outcome: Nurse completes the screening, and the system's logic correctly identifies the high-risk patient and provides an action step.
